**September 2025**  

- Oral presentation and poster accepted at [AFRL Discover](https://airforcetechconnect.org/events/afrl-discover-symposium)

**August 2025**  

- Three papers accepted at the [59th Hawaii International Conference on System Sciences (HICSS)](https://hicss.hawaii.edu/)
- Passed prospectus defense and entered into Ph.D. candidacy

**July 2025**  

- Passed Ph.D. specialty exam

**June 2025**

- Paper accepted for oral presentation at [IEEE National Aerospace Eletronics Conference (NAECON) 2025](https://attend.ieee.org/naecon-2025/) 

**April 2025**

- [Paper on the analogical reasoning abilities and energy efficient of large language models](https://doi.org/10.1109/TCDS.2025.3559771) accepted to *IEEE Transactions on Cognitive and Developmental Sciences*

**February 2025**

- [TechFest Dayton 2025](https://www.techfestdayton.org/) had 2,200+ attendees

**January 2025**

- Three papers presented at the [58th Hawaii International Conference on System Sciences (HICSS)](https://hdl.handle.net/10125/109837)
    - "[Zero-shot comparison of large language models (LLMs) reasoning abilities on long-text analogies](https://hdl.handle.net/10125/109034)" nominated for best paper
